synopsis.text: Tokyo was supposed to be a fresh start for Kyohei, a chance to escape his past and start anew. But when he and his friend Shiba stumble upon a grisly murder scene in an elevator after a night of drinking, Kyohei's old life comes crashing back. As it turns out, the murder is linked to Kyohei's unique ability as a "seki," a person capable of psychically controlling ancient wooden dolls known as "kakashi," which are believed to be divine vessels. Now, a rogue kakashi is on the loose in Tokyo, and it's up to Kyohei to stop it and confront the friend from his past who may be responsible. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride filled with supernatural action and suspense in Kamisama Dolls!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
